Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the fines for the offense of failing to yield the right of way to emergency vehicles en route to an emergency.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing the fines for the offense of failing to yield the right of way to emergency vehicles en route to an emergency.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to proscribing certain conduct at major venue sporting events.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making it illegal for any person to subject or attempt to subject a sports participant at a professional sporting event to contact by any object or substance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing civil penalties for damaging houses of religious worship or religious articles therein.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing civil penalties for vandalizing houses of religious worship or religious articles contained therein.
